briefdescription.para: Do not capture / determine mode from layer geometry type.
Capture points.
Capture lines.
Capture polygons.
Different capture modes.
List to store the points of digitized lines and polygons (in layer coordinates)
The capture mode in which this tool operates.
Flag to indicate a map canvas capture operation is taking place.
Rubber band for polylines and polygons.
Temporary rubber band for polylines and polygons. this connects the last added point to the mouse cursor position.
Keeps point (in map units) snapped to a segment where we most recently finished tracing, so that we can use as the starting point for further tracing.

detaileddescription.para: This is useful mainly when tracing with offset: without knowledge of this point user would need to click a segment again after every time a new trace with offset is created (to get new "anchor" point)

briefdescription.para: constructor
Registers this maptool with the cad dock widget.
Adds a whole curve (e.g. circularstring) to the captured geometry. Curve must be in map CRS.
Override this method when subclassing this class.

detaileddescription.para: This will receive adapted events from the cad system whenever a canvasMoveEvent is triggered and it's not hidden by the cad's construction mode.

parameterdescription.para: Mouse events prepared by the cad system

briefdescription.para: Gets the capture curve.
convenient method to clean members
Clear capture curve.
Unregisters this maptool from the cad dock widget.
Clean a temporary rubberband.
Intercept key events like Esc or Del to delete the last point.
The capture mode.
Returns a list of matches for each point on the captureCurve.
Adds a point to the rubber band (in map coordinates) and to the capture list (in layer coordinates)

simplesect.para: 0 in case of success, 1 if current layer is not a vector layer, 2 if coordinate transformation failed

briefdescription.para: Variant to supply more information in the case of snapping.

parameterdescription.para: The vertex to add in map coordinates
Data about the snapping match. Can be an invalid match, if point not snapped.

briefdescription.para: Close an open polygon.
Fetches the original point from the source layer if it has the same CRS as the current layer.

simplesect.para: 0 in case of success, 1 if not applicable (CRS mismatch), 2 in case of failure

briefdescription.para: Are we currently capturing?

simplesect.para: Is the tool in capture mode?

briefdescription.para: Creates a QgsPoint with ZM support if necessary (according to the WkbType of the current layer).

detaileddescription.para: If the point is snapped, then the Z value is took from the snapped point.

simplesect.para: a point with ZM support if necessary

briefdescription.para: Creates a QgsPoint with ZM support if necessary (according to the WkbType of the current layer).

simplesect.para: a point with ZM support if necessary

briefdescription.para: Converts a map point to layer coordinates.

simplesect.para: 0 in case of success 1 if the current layer is null or not a vector layer 2 if the transformation failed

briefdescription.para: Converts a point to map coordinates and layer coordinates.

simplesect.para: 0 in case of success 1 if the current layer is null or not a vector layer 2 if the transformation failed
